author: Aamir Salati | India.com Sports Desk
title: India vs South Africa 5th ODI Live Scorecard and Ball by Ball Commentary of IND vs SA
text:
India vs South Africa 5th ODI Live Scorecard and Ball by Ball Commentary of IND vs SA By India.com Sports Desk on October 25, 2015 at 12:55 PM Comments Catch the Live Scorecard and Ball by Ball Commentary of India vs South Africa 5th One-Day International (ODI) of the five-match Paytm series. The series is currently levelled at two each. The IND vs SA match will start at 1:30 PM Indian Standard Time (IST) and will be played at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai. You can catch the live scoreboard and ball by ball commentary of India vs South Africa 5th ODI here . Also Catch- Free Live Streaming of IND vs SA 5th ODI The winner will take it all as India and South Africa square-off in the final ODI at Mumbai. The series has seen some keenly fought contests so far and it looks like yet another nail-bitter is on cards. India might start as slight favourites here as South Africa have some injury concerns coming into the game. On the other hand, Indiaâ€™s batting mainstay, Virat Kohli, comes into the game with a brilliant century on his back. Team India will be hoping for a similar sort of performance by Kohli. India ODI Squad: MS Dhoni, Shikhar Dhawan, Virat Kohli, Amit Mishra, Ajinkya Rahane, Ambati Rayudu, Rohit Sharma, Stuart Binny, Gurkeerat Singh Mann, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Axar Patel, Suresh Raina, Mohit Sharma, Harbhajan Singh, Sreenath Aravind. South Africa ODI Squad: Faf du Plessis, Kyle Abbott, Hashim Amla, Farhaan Behardien, Quinton de Kock, AB de Villiers, Jean-Paul Duminy, Imran Tahir, David Miller, Chris Morris, Kagiso Rabada, Khaya Zondo, Morne Morkel, Aaron Phangiso, Dale Steyn.
